description: Tattooed Nic Sahara comes home to find hot, sneaky Zander Lane hiding in his closet! Boyish Zander has been fucking dark-haired Nic’s boyfriend and, when he realizes, slender Nic comes up with a plan to get back at the cheater. He is going to give his boyfriend a taste of his own medicine; he tops fit Zander and gives him an anal pumping he won’t forget. Justice is served when Nic busts a huge, warm load all over Zanders chiseled chest, who knew payback would taste so sweet!
title: Dick Chasing Part 2
